title: Specialist Programmer
description: Built a full-stack movie booking application using Spring Boot and Angular, enhancing the user experience and reducing the time to purchase tickets at movie theatres by 40%.
Integrated a real-time chat application, enabling users to communicate with customer support agents, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement.
Led a team of 4 members, successfully overseeing project deliverables and ensuring timely completion.
Identified and mitigated 2 critical security vulnerabilities, improving the overall system's security posture.
Created an Android application using React Native, reaching the finals of a hackathon with over 100 participants.
Authored 4 technical articles on emerging technologies, contributing to the tech community.

title: Digital Specialist Engineer
description: Increased React application efficiency by 70% through strategic rendering optimizations.
Engineered a robust Python framework with reusable modules for CommerceTools REST and GraphQL APIs, automating manual processes and achieving a remarkable 90% reduction in data setup tasks.
Accelerated AWS Lambda performance by optimizing operations, leveraging consolidated GraphQL requests to achieve a remarkable 3x speed enhancement.
Created React unit test cases, boosting coverage from 20% to 60%.
Mitigated 20+ vulnerabilities identified in Sonar and Checkmarx scans, improving application security and reliability.
